Description.Text: Privately owned and managed, the Ersu offers truly reasonable rates, a fantastic location, 3-star accommodation and warm Turkish hospitality. Located in the upcoming Sirkeci area of Istanbul`s historic centre, the Ersu Hotel is just 5 minutes` walk from Topkapi Palace and Hagia Sophia - surely one of the World`s Greatest Wonders. Everything on a tourist`s sightseeing menu is within walking distance, and this includes the Blue Mosque, Spice Bazaar, Grand Bazaar and Basilica Cistern, to name but a few. Rooms at the Ersu are comfortably and tastefully furnished, offering accommodation that includes ensuite facilities, air-conditioning, satellite LCD-TV, safe, minibar and direct-dial telephone. Breakfast is served buffet style and guests are also sure to appreciate the spacious public areas which include a lobby bar - great for that relaxing drink after a long day`s bargain hunting and sightseeing.
